name: Labyrinth (itch) (ajkal2)
description:
You are a cleaner in the palace of King Minos of Crete, but unfortunately you've stumbled across the wrong door, and it's locked behind you. A series of strange rooms, filled with puzzles and keys, lies ahead of you. Can you find the centre of the maze, and escape the labyrinth? 

-

A very-short text-adventure game, based on exploration and discovery!
